participant_1.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i do like watching cooking shows.

participant_2.background: i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i'm a 56 year old woman. i have two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i fantasize about taking over the world.

content.text: hi, how are you doing? i'm good.
do you like to rollercoaster? i love it.
